title: Crawling Hand

properties.name: description
properties.value: Crawling Hands are Slayer monsters that require level 5 Slayer to kill. The Crawling hands are the first Slayer monster a player can defeat upon reaching the required level. They are also one of the creatures that will sometimes "die" in a perfect form allowing you to get it stuffed by a taxidermist and mounted in your player-owned house.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Crawling Hand

Crawling Hands are Slayer monsters that require level 5 Slayer to kill. The Crawling hands are the first Slayer monster a player can defeat upon reaching the required level. They are also one of the creatures that will sometimes "die" in a perfect form allowing you to get it stuffed by a taxidermist and mounted in your player-owned house.

Due to their undead status, the Crumble Undead spell and the salve amulet do work on them.

While on a crawling hand slayer task, there is a 1/200 chance that a Crushing Hand will spawn after you kill a crawling hand (if you have Bigger and Badder unlocked).

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 1,587,000 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.[1]

The average Crawling Hand kill is worth 155.73.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Although 10 different variants of Crawling Hands exist, only three were initially present in Old School RuneScape. With the release of the Meiyerditch Laboratories, four of the unused versions were added to the game. There are still three variants that cannot be found anywhere ingame.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ iFixje. 65,5k Crawling hands killed AKA lots achieved on an ironman. Reddit. 5 February 2019. (Archived from the original on 9 September 2020.)
  2. ^ Envision. "Drop Rates V2." 22 April 2014. (Archived from the original on 4 Aug 2014.) Old School RuneScape Forums.

[[File:Crawling Hand icon.png|left]]
'''Crawling Hands''' are [[Slayer]] monsters that require level 5 Slayer to kill. The Crawling hands are the first [[Slayer monster]] a player can defeat upon reaching the required level. They are also one of the creatures that will sometimes "die" in a perfect form allowing you to get it stuffed by a [[taxidermist]] and mounted in your [[player-owned house]].

Due to their undead status, the [[Crumble Undead]] spell and the [[salve amulet]] '''do ''' work on them.

While on a crawling hand slayer task, there is a 1/200 chance that a [[Crushing hand|Crushing Hand]] will spawn after you kill a crawling hand (if you have [[Slayer Rewards|Bigger and Badder]] unlocked).

==Trivia==
*Although 10 different variants of Crawling Hands exist, only three were initially present in ''Old School RuneScape''. With the release of the [[Meiyerditch Laboratories]], four of the unused versions were added to the game. There are still three variants that cannot be found anywhere ingame.
